articles.title: Delhi Covid cases drop to 1,447, one more death
articles.description: With 1,694 patients recovering in the last 24 hours, the total number of recoveries has gone to 18,97,091. The number of patients being treated in home isolation has risen at 3,790. The number of Covid containment zones stand at 322 in the city.
articles.content: New Delhi: Delhi on Friday reported significant decline in Covid cases in last 24 hours, at 1,447 against 1,934 recorded on the previous day, while there was one new death, as per the government heal… [+869 chars]
